ygData.subject: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: I completed my Stein quest!!  I suffered a miserable death on the first attempt, however...as the named Ogres (not Bouncers) did not care for my choice of
ygData.messageBody:
I completed my Stein quest!! I suffered a miserable death on the first
attempt, however...as the named Ogres (not Bouncers) did not care for my
choice of diety....

I recommend staying invis until you reach Clurg....

Benevolence is mandatory.


I've had at least a dozen requests to help people do this quest....
If I remember correctly, the Book is No Drop, right? so how can we help?
or is it just a Lore Item?
either way...I know the Stein is Lore...so we will not be able to get
another....right?


If anyone has been able to assist others in this quest, what are you
charging? 50pp? 100pp?


Fistlebane Shimmerdrake of The Rathe
